about.name: Mohd Dilshad Khan
about.summary: I have 3+ years of experience in the Android Development, used RESTful services, integrating different libraries and XML. I was involved in the Development, Testing(Manual) and Implementation of complex software solutions.
about.interests: I discover the world by traveling, getting know the people,eating new things and learning foreign languages.Taking photo is the way to keep all memories in my mind. Also I try to life healthy by cooking and playing sport especially cricket.I listen to music every day and in free time watch movies.
carrerHighlights: 3+ years of experience in Android Application Development
Hands-on experience in design and development of Android Applications
Good knowledge of OOPS concepts and implementation
Good understanding of REST, web services, JSON, XML
Understanding of  Android Architecture Component, Retrofit2, RxJava2.
Working experience with third party libraries like GSON, LibPhoneNumber, ACRA, Firebase Analytics etc
Good understanding of MVP, MVVM architecture patterns
